metadata.title: CVE-2019-12095 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Horde Trean, as used in Horde Groupware Webmail Edition through 5.2.22 andother products, allows CSRF, as demonstrated by the treanBookmarkTagsparameter to the trean/ URI on a webmail server. NOTE: treanBookmarkTagscould, for example, be a stored XSS payload.

criterions.comment: php-horde-trean: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
php-horde: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
